description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-11-30 by 2 p.m. EST. All bids submitted after 2 p.m. EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
Research Bilingual Translation and Revision Services for Impact Assessment Agency of Canada
=====================================

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4294737064-Doc4296103192
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4294737064
* **Publication Date**: November 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 30, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST
* **Amendment Number**: 5

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Impact Assessment Agency of Canada, is soliciting proposals for bilingual translation and revision services.

### Key Dates

* **Tender Closing Date**: November 30, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: TBD
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Service Delivery Location

* **National Capital Region (NCR)**

### Requested Services

The successful proponent will provide bilingual translation and revision services for the Impact Assessment Agency of Canada.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposed services will be evaluated based on the following factors:

* **Technical Merit**
* **Price**

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://www.canada.ca/en/trade-agreements/cfta.html).

### Notice Contact

For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact:
Hakizimana, Christophe (SPAC/PSPC) (il-lui / he-him)
Email: [christophe.hakizimana@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christophe.hakizimana@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Related Documents

For a complete tender package, including solicitation documents, please visit the Ariba Discovery website [here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17952275?extsite=MTc5NTIyNzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
